name: Ambidextro
description:
Recommended to play in full-screen!

Goal: 
Help Dextro the bot pass the highly dangerous tests and get out of the lab! 

How To Play: 
- Select conditions in the Dextronomics panel to inform Dextro what he needs to be aware of to get the key and escape each room. 
- "RUN" will tell Dextro to formulate and execute a plan based on his surroundings and the required conditions to get there. 
- You don't need this to complete any level, but it's fun so we included an override chip to manually move Dextro if you find yourself stuck. Hit "X" to start the override; WASD/Arrow keys to move while override is active.
